value.title: Why Do We Keep Repeating The Same Mistakes On AI?
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence has been on the horizon for over seventy years. Why does it seem so close but also so unattainable? Are we repeating the same mistakes over and over?

value.title: How artificial intelligence can explain its decisions
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence (AI) can be trained to recognize whether a tissue image contains a tumor. However, exactly how it makes its decision has remained a mystery until now. A team from the Research Center for Protein Diagnostics (PRODI) at Ruhr-Universit√§t Bochum is developing a new approach that will render an AI's decision transparent and thus trustworthy.
